record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1899, Champions of the West. Fourth row: Charles G. Flanagan, Frederick Feil, Charles William Even, Bert J. Cassels, and H. B. Conibear (trainer); third row: Henry G. Gale, Kellogg Speed, James R. Henry, Herbert Ahlswede, and Clarence Bert Herschberger; second row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Frank L. Slaker, and August T. Holste; first row: William Eldridge, Ralph C. Hamill, Walter S. Kennedy (captain), Jonathan E. Webb, and James Sheldon. Gift of Robert L. Henry, Class of 1902.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
